pageProps.title: Building new NLP solutions with spaCy and Prodigy

data.title: Building new NLP solutions with spaCy and Prodigy
data.description: In this talk, I will discuss how to address some of the most likely causes of failure for new Natural Language Processing (NLP) projects. My main recommendation is to take an iterative approach: don't assume you know what your pipeline should look like, let alone your annotation schemes or model architectures.
data.author: Matthew Honnibal
